mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Agency( agency_type, parent_id, parent_nickname, password, nickname, avatar, phone, room_card, coin, agency_balance, disable, deleted, create_date, creator_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{agencyType}, #{parentId}, #{parentNickname}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{phone}, #{roomCard}, #{coin}, #{agencyBalance}, #{disable}, #{deleted}, #{createDate}, #{creatorId}, #{userId} )
